analysis.description:
BIXToken.unlock (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#290-309) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- BIXToken.lockedBalance
	- BIXToken.timeRelease
	- BasicToken.balances

BIXCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#409-438) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bixToken.mintBIX(beneficiary,baseBIX,rewardBIX,releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#429-431)
	-bixToken.mintBIX(beneficiary,bixAmount,0,0) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#434-435)

Reentrancy in BIXCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#409-438):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase()) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#411)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiCrowded (/unique_chucks/6/0xc6c95cda7373b0b4b62bed21016057a8145d7787.sol#412-414)
